title: Krishna nama radiates sat cit ananda | Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.key_quote: Krishna is satchitananda vigrah his shuddha nama is also satchitananda vigrah and that satchitananda vigrah naturally not exactly you know he is in the earth not in the earth he is in the earth in the earth You know it emanates Satchitananda.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that Krishna's name radiates satchitananda energy, similar to how the sun radiates light and heat, and this energy is accessible when we connect with it spiritually.
